title: Putting windows in the black box: Developing a set of diagnostic and analytical tools to support multilateral price indexes in production
text:
References


Balk, Bert M. 2008. Price and Quantity Index Numbers: Models for Measuring Aggregate Change and Difference. Cambridge University Press.


Guðmundsdóttir, Heiðrún Erika, and Lára Guðlau Jónasdóttir. 2016. “Scanner Data: Initial Data Testing.” In Meeting of the Group of Experts on Consumer Price Indices. Geneva, Switzerland: UNECE.


Webster, Michael, and Rory C Tarnow-Mordi. 2019. “Decomposing Multilateral Price Indexes into the Contributions of Individual Commodities.” Journal of Official Statistics 35 (2): 461–86.
